TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstallerCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

summary.span: 包含要在安裝期間執行的安裝程式集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of installers to be run during an installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的方法和屬性，您的應用程式需要管理的集合物件。The provides the methods and properties that your application needs to manage a collection of objects. 使用任何的安裝程式加入至集合的下列三種方式：Use any of the following three ways to add installers to the collection: - 方法會將單一安裝程式加入至集合。The method adds a single installer to the collection. - 方法加入至集合的多個安裝程式。The methods add multiple installers to the collection. - 方法和屬性，這是索引子，每個將單一安裝程式加入至集合中指定索引處。The method and the property, which is the indexer, each add a single installer to the collection at the specified index. 移除透過安裝程式方法。Remove installers through the method. 檢查安裝程式是否在集合中，使用方法。Check whether an installer is in the collection by using the method. 尋找其中安裝程式位於集合中使用方法。Find where an installer is located in the collection by using the method. 集合中的安裝程式執行時安裝程式，含有所指定的集合屬性，會呼叫其， ， ，或方法。The installers in a collection are run when the installer containing the collection, as specified by the property, calls their , , , or methods. 如需安裝程式集合的使用方式的範例，請參閱和類別。For examples of the usage of an installer collection, see the and classes. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法類別。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 此範例中提供類似的實作[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。This example provides an implementation similar to that of [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 它會與之前的該特定的組件選項安裝組件。It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly. 如果選項未指定組件中前, 一個組件的選項是如果在清單中上一個組件。If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assembly's options are taken if there is a previous assembly in the list. 如果 「 / u"或"/ 解除安裝 」 指定選項時，會解除安裝組件。If the "/u" or "/uninstall" option is specified, the assemblies are uninstalled. 如果"/？"If the "/?" 或"/ 說明 」 提供選項，主控台就會顯示 [說明] 資訊。or "/help" option is provided, the help information is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/CPP/installercollection_add.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/CS/installercollection_add.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallerCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Add/VB/installercollection_add.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的每個已加入設包含此集合。The property of each added is set to the containing this collection. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法類別。The following example demonstrates the method of the class. 它會建立的執行個體`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。這些執行個體加入至。It creates instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.These instances are added to a . 安裝程序會同時`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。The installation process installs both `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的每個已加入設包含此集合。The property of each added is set to the containing this collection. ## Examples 下列範例會示範方法和方法類別。The following example demonstrates the method and the methods of the class. 它會建立的執行個體`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。It creates instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`. 這些執行個體的加入至名為`myTransactedInstaller1`。These instances of are added to a named `myTransactedInstaller1`. 中的安裝程式`myTransactedInstaller1`複製到另一個名為`myTransactedInstaller2`。The installers in the `myTransactedInstaller1` are copied to another named `myTransactedInstaller2`. 安裝程序會同時`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。The installation process installs both `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`. [!code-cpp[InstallerCollection_Insert#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Insert/CPP/installercollection_insert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallerCollection_Insert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Insert/CS/installercollection_insert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallerCollection_Insert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallerCollection_Insert/VB/installercollection_insert.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指定放在、屬性設其中包含的集合。When the specified is placed in the , the property of the is set to the that contains the collection. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的執行個體`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。The following example creates instances for `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`. 這些執行個體加入至。These instances are added to a . 要安裝的所有組件名稱會顯示到主控台。The names of all the assemblies that are to be installed are displayed to the console. 安裝程序會同時`MyAssembly1.exe`和`MyAssembly2.exe`。The installation process installs both `MyAssembly1.exe` and `MyAssembly2.exe`.
